summary: A large home, which has a secret path that connects to a rather tall tower, with the best view Skyrim has to offer. Includes two mannequins, and a couple dozen weapon racks.
descriptionHtml:
A large manor, along with a very tall tower which has a view of Helgen, Bleak Falls Barrow, Whiterun (with Dawnstar in the far distance), Riverwood and Lake Ilinalta. Inside, there is a private armoury for your arms, and tow mannequins in your room. Of course, you have three outfits. Your armour, your casual attire, and your sleeping outfit. Now, you do not need to worry about carrying around all your clothes, when just going for a walk. Cloud-Gazer Manor is the one home you need.


Future Plans: Completely renovate the home, adding more weapon racks, plaques, display cases, and more noble furniture. Will have the tower removed in a separate version if requested.
author: Svadas
